message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you for $180. I think you'll find it's a steal at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140. It's a high-quality product that I know you'll be happy with.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $110.
